summary: The diff implements most PWA conversion requirements: manifest.json, sw.js, index.html PWA meta tags, PWAInstallPrompt component, and Layout integration are all present. However, the two required PNG icon files (icon-192x192.png and icon-512x512.png) are not included in the diff, and the install prompt banner is missing the 'Add to Home Screen' button in the top nav area as specified in REQ-37.

missing_requirements.requirement: Place the two generated PWA app icon PNG files as static assets at frontend/public/assets/icons/icon-192x192.png and frontend/public/assets/icons/icon-512x512.png.
missing_requirements.reason: No PNG icon files appear in the diff's added or modified files. The paths are referenced in manifest.json and index.html but the actual binary image files are not present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Also show a small 'Add to Home Screen' button in the top nav area visible on mobile.
missing_requirements.reason: The PWAInstallPrompt component only implements the bottom banner. There is no evidence of an 'Add to Home Screen' button added to the top nav area in Layout.tsx or any nav component.
